data.caption: Special Window For Transfer And Dematerialisation Of Physical Securities
data.news_body: Pursuant to the SEBI Circular No. HO/38/13/11(2)2026-MIRSD-POD/I/3750/2026 dated 30th January 2026 a Special Window has been opened for a period of one year from 05th February 2026 to 04th February 2027 for transfer and dematerialization ("demat") of physical securities.
